line_item_id.description: The ID of this generated amortization schedule.

cycle_exclusive_end.description: The date-time the am cycle ends.

min_pay_due_at.description: The date the minimum payment for the am schedule is due.

min_pay_cents.description: The total amount due for the entire cycle, beyond what is due for the am schedule, as this value accounts for fees.

min_pay_no_fee_cents.description: The amount due just for the am schedule. This accounts for principal, interest, and deferred interest balance but does not include fees.

min_pay_fees_cents.description: The fees portion of the cycle payment in cents. This does not go towards amortized.

cycle_payments_cents.description: The amount in cents that was actually paid for the billing cycle

min_pay_interest_cents.description: The amount in cents allocated to interest from this am payment

min_pay_deferred_cents.description: The amount in cents allocated to deferred interest from this am payment

min_pay_loans_principal_cents.description: The amount in cents allocated to principal from this am payment

total_balance_cents.description: The ending balance on the loan after this payment

paid_on_time.description: Indicates whether the amount for this am payment was paid on time; only present if the date scheduled for the am payment has passed as of the time of the request.
